channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Department of Computer Science, National University of Singapore on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Gradient-Free Methods for Nonconvex Nonsmooth Stochastic Compositional Optimization
item.description: Gradient-free methods conquer nonconvex nonsmooth stochastic compositional optimization, providing non-asymptotic convergence rates and improved efficiency for real-world applications.

item.title: Out-of-Distribution Detection with a Single Unconditional Diffusion Model
item.description: Single diffusion model achieves competitive out-of-distribution detection across diverse tasks by analyzing diffusion path characteristics.
